name: Get the Ball Rolling
description:
Get the Ball Rolling is a single player ball rolling adventure puzzle platformer inspired by several other games such as Marble It Up!, Super Monkey Ball, Portal 1 and 2, Super Metroid, The Legend of Zelda and Super Mario Galaxy 1 and 2. While still early in development, Get the Ball Rolling is a fully playable game from start to finish, including a mainland island connected to 13 puzzles through portals, a finale puzzle, 6 collectable permanent powerups (Jump, Double Jump, Climb and more), 3 temporary powerups (Big Ball, Fast Ball, Multi Ball), a 3 profile save/load system, puzzle select mode for beating the game and more!

Cost: $4.99 USD.
Current estimated time to completion: 3+ hours.
Only mouse and keyboard are currently supported. Full Xbox, Playstation and Steam Controller support coming soon!

Whether you decide to jump in now or hold off until the game is more complete, the price will never change. Thank you for your interest in Get the Ball Rolling!
